Name: Apple Martini (simple)
Ingredients: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Garnish with maraschino cherry dropped into cocktail.
Review: This is subtitled "simple" for good reason but, if freshly pressed juice is used, it's as good if not better than other Apple 'Martini' recipes.
History: Recipe by yours truly in 2004. Our Martini cocktail page details its evolution and other common variants.
Nutrition: One serving of Apple Martini (simple) contains 234 calories
